effect.en: Whenever you attach a Grass, Water, or Psychic basic Energy card from your hand to Celebi, Celebi's type (color) becomes the same as that type of energy until the end of the turn.
Remove 2 damage counters from Celebi and each Pokémon that's the same type (color) as Celebi.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
